articles.description: The drug has been launched under the brand APATIDE in India to treat both metastatic castration sensitive prostate cancer as well as non-metastatic castration resistant prostate cancer, the company said in a statement.

articles.title: 4.74 lakh children to get additional dose of measles vaccine in Maha - Inshorts
articles.description: Maharashtra government has identified 4.74 lakh children under the age of five for an additional dose of measles vaccine. At least 2.47 lakh of these children have already been immunised. The first phase of the immunisation drive was completed on December 25 …
